org.microbean.helm.maven

Class GetReleaseStatusMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractHelmMojo
        • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractReleaseMojo
          • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractSingleReleaseMojo
            • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractSingleVersionedReleaseMojo
              • org.microbean.helm.maven.GetReleaseStatusMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextEnabled, Mojo

    @Mojo(name="status")
public class GetReleaseStatusMojo
extends AbstractSingleVersionedReleaseMojo
    Retrieves the status of a release version.
    Author:
    Laird Nelson

    • Constructor Detail

      • GetReleaseStatusMojo

        public GetReleaseStatusMojo()
        Creates a new GetReleaseStatusMojo.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        protected void execute(Callable<ReleaseManager> releaseManagerCallable)
                throws Exception
        Performs a release-oriented task using a ReleaseManager available from the supplied Callable.

        This implementation retrieves the status for a given release at a particular version and notifies registered ReleaseStatusListeners.

        Specified by:
        execute in class AbstractReleaseMojo
        Parameters:
        releaseManagerCallable - the Callable that will provide a ReleaseManager; must not be null
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs

      • addReleaseStatusListener

        public void addReleaseStatusListener(ReleaseStatusListener listener)
        Adds a ReleaseStatusListener that will be notified when a release version's status is retrieved
        Parameters:
        listener - the ReleaseStatusListener to add; may be null in which case no action will be taken
        See Also:
        removeReleaseStatusListener(ReleaseStatusListener), getReleaseStatusListenersList()

      • removeReleaseStatusListener

        public void removeReleaseStatusListener(ReleaseStatusListener listener)
        Removes a ReleaseStatusListener from this GetReleaseStatusMojo.
        Parameters:
        listener - the ReleaseStatusListener to remove; may be null in which case no action will be taken
        See Also:
        addReleaseStatusListener(ReleaseStatusListener), getReleaseStatusListenersList()

      • getReleaseStatusListeners

        public ReleaseStatusListener[] getReleaseStatusListeners()
        Invokes the getReleaseStatusListenersList() method and converts its return value to an array.

        This method never returns null.

        Overrides of this method must not return null.

        Returns:
        a non-null array of ReleaseStatusListeners
        See Also:
        getReleaseStatusListenersList()

      • getReleaseStatusListenersList

        public List<ReleaseStatusListener> getReleaseStatusListenersList()
        Returns the List of ReleaseStatusListeners whose elements will be notified when a release version's status is retrieved.

        This method may return null.

        Overrides of this method are permitted to return null.

        Returns:
        a List of ReleaseStatusListeners, or null
        See Also:
        setReleaseStatusListenersList(List), addReleaseStatusListener(ReleaseStatusListener), removeReleaseStatusListener(ReleaseStatusListener)

      • setReleaseStatusListenersList

        public void setReleaseStatusListenersList(List<ReleaseStatusListener> releaseStatusListeners)
        Installs the List of ReleaseStatusListeners whose elements will be notified when a release version's status is retrieved.
        Parameters:
        releaseStatusListeners - the List of ReleaseStatusListeners whose elements will be notified when a release status is retrieved; may be null
        See Also:
        getReleaseStatusListenersList(), addReleaseStatusListener(ReleaseStatusListener), removeReleaseStatusListener(ReleaseStatusListener)
